name: Solar System Project for the Coursera Unity Course
name_original: Solar System Project for the Coursera Unity Course
description:
I created this by following along the lectures from this Coursera course: https://www.coursera.org/learn/game-design-and-development-1. For some reason, the WebGL build kept failing (maybe because I'm running Unity on Linux). I tried finding a solution for the problem online, but couldn't make it work. I provided the Windows, Mac and Linux builds instead.

I made the following modifications from the original instructions:

  1. Added Mercury, Venus, Mars and Jupiter
  2. Added Mars and Jupiter moons with existing textures from the project
  3. Moved the camera slightly above the solar system plane to give it a better view
  4. Adjusted a few parameters such as sound source falloff, comet speed and frequency, etc. to my liking

Credits:

Matija & Adam H. (my son is following along with me and learning).
